parameters.name: DynamicSql
parameters.description: Specifies whether the SQL statement is an aggregation statement.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time.

The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of returned rows of the SQL statement.

parameters.name: SqlId
parameters.description: The ID of the SQL statement.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time.

The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: TraceId
parameters.description:
The trace ID of the executed query, which is the value of TraceId returned by DescribeSQLSamples.
> Note 
Not all trace IDs of slow SQL statements can be used to query the original text.
